originalText.text: Dr. Evan Goldstein is truly a remarkable figure. My partner and I underwent life-changing surgeries at Bespoke Surgical, an experience that can only be described as nothing short of extraordinary. Whenever a friend or family member mentions any discomfort related to their rear, I make sure to recommend Bespoke Surgical, a place where miracles truly become a reality.

text.text: Dr. Evan Goldstein is truly a remarkable figure. My partner and I underwent life-changing surgeries at Bespoke Surgical, an experience that can only be described as nothing short of extraordinary. Whenever a friend or family member mentions any discomfort related to their rear, I make sure to recommend Bespoke Surgical, a place where miracles truly become a reality.

originalText.text: This is a very very good Dr. And even better surgeon. I went to many places and got told I could not get surgery but they tried other things that did not help me and kept saying there’s no way they will do surgery because I will die. He was the only one that did surgery and did a very very good job. If there was a way to leave 100 stars I would leave them. Him and all of his staff and nurses in his office and surgery center are very friendly and get back to you very fast if you have any questions. If you need anything goto him!

originalText.text: Kind, compassionate and caring. I have been a patient of Dr. Goldstein for several years and have been impressed with the quality of care and service provided by him and his support staff. His care is thorough and I always feel that I am in good hands. True Pro!

text.text: Kind, compassionate and caring. I have been a patient of Dr. Goldstein for several years and have been impressed with the quality of care and service provided by him and his support staff. His care is thorough and I always feel that I am in good hands. True Pro!

originalText.text: Dr. G is the best. His bedside manner is always comforting and often even gets you to crack a smile and a laugh on the table--an experience which might otherwise be uncomfortable. He always starts appointments in his posh office, getting the update on your life since you last saw each other, and over the years has almost come to feel like a big brother. He is quick on email, transparent, and having now lived in two different cities since New York always accommodated an appointment when I'm coming to down, or a referral to get me setup with a new GP etc from his network etc. I have several friends who see him and highly recco!

originalText.text: Great office. Friendly environment. Take care of all concerns.
